last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview:
The journey begins and ends - where else!? - at Ricky's hometown of Liverpool - but they're quickly on the road on the first leg of their

trip, heading to some real Lancashire hot-spots...

name: Ricky and Ralf's Very Northern Road Trip
original_name: Ricky and Ralf's Very Northern Road Trip
overview: The Royle Family’s dad and son Ricky Tomlinson and Ralf Little reunite years after they last got together, for a heart-warming and hilarious staycation, travelling the length and breadth of northern England, in a quest to unlock each of its region’s own unique secrets.
